data.meta_description: Daniel Julez J. Smith Jr is widely gaining media attention as a celebrity kid. He is the only son of famous American singer Solange Knowles and her ex-spouse Daniel Smith. Daniel Jr is also identified as the nephew of widely popular musician, actress, Beyonce Giselle Knowles.
data.text:
Daniel Julez J. Smith Jr is widely gaining media attention as a celebrity kid. He is the only son of famous American singer Solange Knowles and her ex-spouse Daniel Smith. Daniel Jr is also identified as the nephew of widely popular musician, actress, Beyonce Giselle Knowles.

Daniel Julez was born on October 18, 2004, in Houston, Texas, USA, under the zodiac sign of Libra. As of now, Daniel Julez Jr is living limelight and lavish lifestyle with his beloved mother and spends quality time with his father as well.

Renowned Mother: Solange Knowles

Daniel Smith Jr is gaining media attention since his birth as a celebrity son; all credit goes to his well-known and beloved mom Solange.

The 34-years-old Solange is an R&B, pop, hip-hop, songwriter, singer, record producer, and actress as well. Knowles has released four studio albums namely Solo Star, Sol-Angel and the Hadley St. Dreams, A Seat at the Table, and When I Get Home.

The albums include the hit songs such as Feelin You, I Decided, Fuck the Industry, Losing You, Cranes in the Sky, etc. The Grammy Award-winning Solange has also starred in movies and TV shows like Bring It On: All or Nothing, Jhonson Family Vacation, Taina, and others.

Parent's Brief Marital Relationship

The singer Solange first met Daniel Smith at a high school party via a mutual friend back in 1986 when she was 13-years-old. At the time, Daniel was in high school. In the interview, Solange revealed that they were high school sweethearts.

After dating several years, Solange and Daniel decided to tie the wedding knot. They got married in February 2004, after she discovered that she was pregnant with Daniel's son Daniel Jr.

Solange gave birth to their child in October 2004 and the family moved on to live in Moscow. From the day, the married pair were also parenting their kid merrily and jointly.

Everything was going fine but after three years of marital relationship, Solange & Daniel divorced in 2007. It seems like even after the separation, they remain good friends and are parenting their son happily.

Half-Siblings

Daniel Smith Jr is the only child of Solange and Daniel. He does not have any biological siblings, but he does have a half-sister and brother-born via his father's extramarital affair.

After the separation from Solange, Daniel Smith married Karla Anisa Karim. Daniel's second wife Karla currently works as A&R, Consultant at Artist Publishing Group (APG).

Karla and Daniel shared three kids from their marital bond. They welcomed their first child, a daughter, Saniya J Smith in 2009. Similarly, they became parents for the second and third time in 2016 & 2020 respectively, who shared sons named Legend J and Five J Smith.

On the other hand, after divorcing Daniel, singer Solange married music video director Alan Ferguson on November 16, 2014. But this marriage was also fleeting which ended up in 2019. Additionally, Knowles and Ferguson did not share any kids from the marriage.

Is Daniel Julez J. Smith Jr Dating Someone?

The 16-years-old Daniel Julez Jr has not mentioned his exact relationship status towards media. However, there is a rumor circulating all over the media that Solange's son Daniel Jr is dating Jodie Woods.

The 13-years-old Jodie is the sister of model Jordyn Woods. Although, Woods and Smith Jr are facing rumors regarding their affair. They have not mentioned their relationship status clearly.

Net Worth

Julez Smith Jr is currently focused on his studies. So, more than doing professional works and earning a good sum of wealth he enjoys his parent's net worth. Besides, Julez is also active on Instagram where he has amassed 84 thousand followers.

As of 2020, Daniel Jr's mother Solange has a net worth of $9 million which she acquired from her successful professional career. On the other side, Solange's eldest sister (Daniel Jr's aunt) Beyonce owns a total fortune of $500 million.
